caption.p:
Functionality properties of Gsp. Emulsifying activity index (A), emulsifying stability (B), foaming capacity (C), and foaming stability (D) of Gsp. Values are expressed as means ±
SD of nine samples in each group. Different lower‐case letters (a, b, c, and d) indicate significant difference for the different germinated soybean protein samples at p ≤ 0.05
